name: {{countryCode}} Alert Condition - {{appName}} - User Experience - Browser - Page Load Time SLO

nrql.query: SELECT clamp_max(percentage(count(*), WHERE duration < 3 AND pageUrl NOT LIKE '%error%') / 95 * 100, 100) FROM PageView WHERE entityGuid in (BrowserGuids) AND pageUrl NOT LIKE '%error%' FACET pageUrl, entityGuid
